title: Warehouse Operative
text:
Warehouse Operative
Recruitment Genius
Join a fast-growing family-owned company a Warehouse Operative. Full training is given, and there are great career prospects.
THE JOB:
- Manufacturing of stock.
- Picking, packing, and despatching orders.
- Assisting with the incoming and outgoing of goods.
- Recording the batch numbers, expiry dates, and locations of goods.
- Maintaining quality standards within the warehouse.
- Cleaning of cleanroom & manufacturing equipment.
- Assisting with the operation of packaging machinery.
- Checking packaging and products to meet quality standards.
- Hours are preferably 8:15 am - 4:30 pm, Monday -Thursday, and 8:45 am - 3:45 pm, Friday.
KEY SKILLS & EXPERIENCE:
- Physically able for heavy lifting.
- Basic IT skills.
- Ideally, experience within the warehouse industry.
- Must live within 15 miles of Burnley.
SALARY & BENEFITS:
- Â£10.80 per hour.
- 28 days holidays + including public holidays with increases for length of service up to 32 days.
- Private health care plan .
- Pension.
- Benefits packages include annual performance-related pay reviews, profit sharing, and pay banding opportunities for growth.
If you want to be part of a company with the opportunity of career progression, please apply now!
Applicants must currently have the permanent right to work in the UK; visa applications cannot be considered.
